titleInfo.title: Country Music Spectacular with Bill Anderson and Ferlin Huskey at the Minnesota Auditorium

mods.abstract: Two color window card (black and red on white) announcing a Country Music Spectacular with Bill Anderson, Ferlin Husky, Stonewall Jackson, Del Reeves and Jan Howard at the Minneapolis Auditorium on February 14. Poster features metal photoplates of Bill Anderson, Ferlin Husky, Stonewall Jackson, Del Reeves and Jan Howard.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
